product.description: Acryl-W is a plastic elastic sealant for interior and exterior use, based on acrylic resin emulsion with a good adhesion to many materials. Paintable with emulsion paints, freeze resistant and not corrosive towards metals. Conforms to the SNJF-standard. After curing Acryl-W is weather and rain resistant.
product.application: For sealing cracks and joints where moderate amounts of movement can occur (max. 12.5%). Not suitable for joints exposed to continuous water immersion.

product.description: Pyrocryl is a one-component, highly qualified emulsion based sealant for fire retarding constructions. This product will transfer into a foam above 200 °C, is almost odour free and non-corrosive towards metals. Will show good adhesion without a primer on building materials like concrete, brickwork, painted wood, anodised aluminium and uPVC.
product.application: Especially for indoor joints where high demands are to be met as a fire resistant seal. Joints in fire retardant constructions in buildings, houses and ships. Perimeter pointing around door and window frames, concrete and brickwork. Joints between walls and ceilings, and joints around pipes and cable work.

product.description: Glue Screws is a versatile construction adhesive. The adhesive cures by evaporation of solvents and forms a strong, durable, moisture resistant, lasting flexible bond.
Mirrofix Adhesive is a gunnable adhesive for gluing mirrors with fast, good adhesion. *Consult our guide on gluing mirrors.
Super Glue is a cyano-acrylic based liquid one-component fast curing glue, with very good adhesion. Super Glue is translucent and provides a very strong bond.

Sprayable sealer and bonder. Fast curing paintable, with very good adhesion to metals, primers and enamels. Reduces acoustic vibrations. Protects against corrosion. Moisture resistant. No solvents, silicones or isocyanate.
product.application: Designed for the motor industry to restore seals and bonds. Seals and bridges seams, cracks and gaps in the automotive and building sectors. Restores surface damage. Bonds lightweight building materials. Protects against chipping, prevents corrosion of bodywork parts.

product.description: Transparent, water resistant, non-shrinking glue sticks for non porous and porous surfaces.
product.application: For adhesion of concrete, glass, ceramic, metal, wood, cardboard, leather, plastic and material, as well as cable fixing.

product.description: Fix-O-Chim is a fast curing, two component chemical fastener based on synthetic resins. It is ideal for use instead of plugs or expansion anchors as no pressure build up takes place. Not recommended for continuous water immersion. Temperature resistance of up to +80 °C.
product.application: As a chemical anchor for wire rods and screws in massive and hollow surfaces such as concrete, aerated concrete, brickwork and hollow stones. For solid fastening of window frames, roller blinds, banisters, hinges, etc., in building constructions. Also as a synthetic repair mortar for concrete.

product.description: High Tack for instant tack and adhering of weights up to 25kg. High Tack is a high quality, strong, one component MS Polymer based adhesive with very high grip. The product is odourless, neutral and free of silicone and isocyanates.
product.application: For use on stone panels, skirting, windowsills, mirrors, glass and glazed surfaces, porcelain, coated metals, polystyrene, stainless steel, copper and finished wood.

product.description:
PU & NBS Applicator Foam B3/B2 is a one component fast curing construction foam based on moisture curing polyurethane, containing a safety propellant, with excellent gap filling capability. Precise application with the NBS applicator.

PU FOAM APPLICATOR:The PU Foam applicator is equipped with a regulator to adjust the foam output. The foam applicator provided with an adaptor for the Uni-NBS system.
product.application: For ceiling joints between walls ,ceilings, floors and gaps around pipes, windows and door frames.

product.description: Hybriflex LM is a one component moisture curing, low-modulus sealant and adhesive.
product.application: Interior and exterior dilatation joints in concrete. Expansion & sealing joints in almost all building substrates. Joints between wooden, metal, aluminium or PVC frames and masonry.

product.description: Tecflex 3060 - 510 is a one component moisture curing, high-modulus adhesive. It's FREE from isocyanates and silicones, has excellent high-tack and non sag properties, as well as excellent adhesion without primer on plastic, glass and metal. Speed curing time and short cut-off string. It's non conductive and non corrosive.
product.application: Bonding and sealing of fixed glass and body parts in automotive, trucks, busses, aeronautical and marine industry, farm and construction equipments. High tack glue for building material on interior and exterior.

product.description: Silicone Sanitary is a high quality fungal resistant elastic sealant based on polysiloxanes (acid curing) which is waterproof, resistant to moisture, detergents and household chemicals, and has good adhesion to many surfaces (without primer).
product.application: For sealing joints and cracks in bathrooms, shower cubicles, kitchens and utility rooms.

product.description: Silicone - 1001U Professional is a high quality, ready-to-use elastic sealant based on polysiloxanes (acid curing) with a very good adhesion to many surfaces. Excellent UV and weather resistance.
product.application: Sealing joints around buildings, industrial and fenestration applications.

product.description: Gasket Sealant is a high quality one component durable elastic sealant, based on polysiloxanes (acid curing) with very good temperature resistance up to 300 °C. Easy to apply, with good adhesion.
product.application: For forming in gasket applications, sealing and bonding, automotive, sealing of industrial ovens, and sealing of joints where extremely high temperature resistance is required.

product.description: Silicone-NO is a high quality neutral curing fungal resistant, durable, elastic sealant based on polysiloxanes, with excellent adhesion on many surfaces (without primer). Has good UV and weather resistance. Silicone-NO complies with most international standards.
product.application: For sealing joints where mildew is undesirable. Suitable as a perimeter and weather sealant. For sealing joints in glazing systems, buildings and general construction industry.

product.description: Silicone Structural Glazing Sealant is a one-component, high-strength neutral cure sealant specially designed and tested for structurally glazed curtain wall applications.
product.application: All structural glazing applications such as in-shop or field glazing or curtain wall modules where glass lights are attached to the metal framing system with a structural sealant. Can also be used as a weatherseal in glass to glass butt joints and as a top sealant in glazing systems.

product.description: Zwaluw MK5 H310 is a closed, manual gun for foil packs of up to 310 ml. Pressure provided by not serrated releasing bar on the back of the gun.
product.application: For the application of a variety of sealants and adhesives using cartridges or foil packs.

product.description: Zwaluw HKS12 Metal is a lightweight open manual caulking gun for 310 ml cartridges. Drip-free thanks to automatic stop in hand grip.
product.application: For the application of a variety of sealants and adhesives using cartridges or foil packs.

product.description: Zwaluw Backer Rod is a round open-(polyurethane) or closed-cell (polyethylene) foam rod used to fill joints between building materials to make sure the joint sealant will reach its correct dimension in width and depth. Zwaluw Backer Rod can be delivered in various diameters, 0 6 till 50 mm.
product.application: Zwaluw Backer Rod can be used in construction and expansion joints to achieve the right joint-dimensions and to prevent a three-sided adhesion of the sealant.
